major_00_fool.title: The Fool

meaning.general: A fresh start and a leap of faith.
meaning.light: Playful optimism and a willingness to explore.
meaning.shadow: Naivety, rash risks, or ignoring the obvious.
meaning.advice: Begin, but carry a small plan with your hope.

major_00_fool.fact: Numbered 0, The Fool is the journey before it starts.
major_00_fool.detailedDescription: A fresh start and a leap of faith. Playful optimism and a willingness to explore. Naivety, rash risks, or ignoring the obvious. Begin, but carry a small plan with your hope.

major_01_magician.title: The Magician

meaning.general: Focused will and the tools to make ideas real.
meaning.light: Confidence, skill, and aligned action.
meaning.shadow: Manipulation or scattered energy.
meaning.advice: Pick one aim and commit your resources.

major_01_magician.fact: The Magician holds all four suit symbols on the table.
major_01_magician.detailedDescription: Focused will and the tools to make ideas real. Confidence, skill, and aligned action. Manipulation or scattered energy. Pick one aim and commit your resources.

major_02_high_priestess.title: The High Priestess

meaning.general: Quiet knowledge and the pull of intuition.
meaning.light: Trusting subtle signals and inner truth.
meaning.shadow: Withholding, secrecy, or ignoring feelings.
meaning.advice: Listen before you speak or act.

major_02_high_priestess.fact: She sits between pillars marked for the seen and unseen.
major_02_high_priestess.detailedDescription: Quiet knowledge and the pull of intuition. Trusting subtle signals and inner truth. Withholding, secrecy, or ignoring feelings. Listen before you speak or act.

major_03_empress.title: The Empress

meaning.general: Abundance, care, and embodied creativity.
meaning.light: Warmth, growth, and fertile ideas.
meaning.shadow: Overgiving or being smothered by comfort.
meaning.advice: Feed what you want to grow.

major_03_empress.fact: The Empress is linked to Venus and the earth.
major_03_empress.detailedDescription: Abundance, care, and embodied creativity. Warmth, growth, and fertile ideas. Overgiving or being smothered by comfort. Feed what you want to grow.

major_04_emperor.title: The Emperor

meaning.general: Order, structure, and responsible leadership.
meaning.light: Clear boundaries and steady authority.
meaning.shadow: Rigidity, control, or fear of change.
meaning.advice: Lead with firmness and fairness.

major_04_emperor.fact: The Emperor embodies the stabilizing force of Aries.
major_04_emperor.detailedDescription: Order, structure, and responsible leadership. Clear boundaries and steady authority. Rigidity, control, or fear of change. Lead with firmness and fairness.

major_05_hierophant.title: The Hierophant

meaning.general: Shared values, tradition, and learning from elders.
meaning.light: Mentorship, ritual, and steady teachings.
meaning.shadow: Dogma, conformity, or resisting growth.
meaning.advice: Honor the lesson, then make it your own.

major_05_hierophant.fact: The Hierophant bridges the sacred and the social.
major_05_hierophant.detailedDescription: Shared values, tradition, and learning from elders. Mentorship, ritual, and steady teachings. Dogma, conformity, or resisting growth. Honor the lesson, then make it your own.

major_06_lovers.title: The Lovers

meaning.general: Alignment of values before commitment.
meaning.light: Mutual choice, harmony, and honest connection.
meaning.shadow: Indecision, temptation, or values out of sync.
meaning.advice: Choose what truly matches your heart.

major_06_lovers.fact: The Lovers are about alignment more than romance.
major_06_lovers.detailedDescription: Alignment of values before commitment. Mutual choice, harmony, and honest connection. Indecision, temptation, or values out of sync. Choose what truly matches your heart.

major_07_chariot.title: The Chariot

meaning.general: Discipline and will guiding opposing forces.
meaning.light: Momentum, confidence, and steady drive.
meaning.shadow: Aggression, scattered focus, or forcing outcomes.
meaning.advice: Hold the reins and steer with purpose.

major_07_chariot.fact: The Chariot is linked to the sign of Cancer.
major_07_chariot.detailedDescription: Discipline and will guiding opposing forces. Momentum, confidence, and steady drive. Aggression, scattered focus, or forcing outcomes. Hold the reins and steer with purpose.

major_08_strength.title: Strength

meaning.general: Gentle power and steady inner courage.
meaning.light: Calm resilience and compassionate control.
meaning.shadow: Self-doubt, suppressed anger, or forcing calm.
meaning.advice: Lead with patience, not pressure.

major_08_strength.fact: Strength is associated with the sign of Leo.
major_08_strength.detailedDescription: Gentle power and steady inner courage. Calm resilience and compassionate control. Self-doubt, suppressed anger, or forcing calm. Lead with patience, not pressure.

major_09_hermit.title: The Hermit

meaning.general: Withdrawal to find inner guidance.
meaning.light: Reflection, clarity, and honest self-study.
meaning.shadow: Isolation, avoidance, or withdrawing too long.
meaning.advice: Step back to see the path clearly.

major_09_hermit.fact: The Hermit carries a lantern to light the way.
major_09_hermit.detailedDescription: Withdrawal to find inner guidance. Reflection, clarity, and honest self-study. Isolation, avoidance, or withdrawing too long. Step back to see the path clearly.

major_10_wheel.title: Wheel of Fortune

meaning.general: A turning cycle and shifting circumstances.
meaning.light: Positive momentum and welcome change.
meaning.shadow: Feeling stuck in a loop or resisting the turn.
meaning.advice: Move with the change instead of fighting it.

major_10_wheel.fact: The wheel reminds us that everything turns.
major_10_wheel.detailedDescription: A turning cycle and shifting circumstances. Positive momentum and welcome change. Feeling stuck in a loop or resisting the turn. Move with the change instead of fighting it.

major_11_justice.title: Justice

meaning.general: Clarity, fairness, and consequences.
meaning.light: Honesty, integrity, and balanced judgment.
meaning.shadow: Bias, denial, or fear of truth.
meaning.advice: Tell the truth and accept what it brings.

major_11_justice.fact: Justice is linked to the sign of Libra.
major_11_justice.detailedDescription: Clarity, fairness, and consequences. Honesty, integrity, and balanced judgment. Bias, denial, or fear of truth. Tell the truth and accept what it brings.

major_12_hanged_man.title: The Hanged Man

meaning.general: A pause that reveals a new view.
meaning.light: Letting go to gain insight.
meaning.shadow: Stalling, martyrdom, or fear of change.
meaning.advice: Release control and see what shifts.

major_12_hanged_man.fact: The Hanged Man is about perspective, not punishment.
major_12_hanged_man.detailedDescription: A pause that reveals a new view. Letting go to gain insight. Stalling, martyrdom, or fear of change. Release control and see what shifts.

major_13_death.title: Death

meaning.general: An ending that clears the way forward.
meaning.light: Release, renewal, and true transformation.
meaning.shadow: Clinging to the past or fearing change.
meaning.advice: Let the old fall away so the new can rise.

major_13_death.fact: Death is tied to Scorpio and deep change.
major_13_death.detailedDescription: An ending that clears the way forward. Release, renewal, and true transformation. Clinging to the past or fearing change. Let the old fall away so the new can rise.

major_14_temperance.title: Temperance

meaning.general: Blending extremes into harmony.
meaning.light: Patience, healing, and steady integration.
meaning.shadow: Imbalance, excess, or forcing a mix.
meaning.advice: Go slowly and let the blend settle.

major_14_temperance.fact: Temperance is linked to the sign of Sagittarius.
major_14_temperance.detailedDescription: Blending extremes into harmony. Patience, healing, and steady integration. Imbalance, excess, or forcing a mix. Go slowly and let the blend settle.

major_15_devil.title: The Devil

meaning.general: Attachments that feel like control.
meaning.light: Awareness of what binds you.
meaning.shadow: Addiction, fear, or giving away power.
meaning.advice: Name the chain, then loosen it.

major_15_devil.fact: The Devil mirrors the Lovers, but without choice.
major_15_devil.detailedDescription: Attachments that feel like control. Awareness of what binds you. Addiction, fear, or giving away power. Name the chain, then loosen it.

major_16_tower.title: The Tower

meaning.general: A sudden shake that reveals truth.
meaning.light: Breakthrough, liberation, and clarity.
meaning.shadow: Chaos, resistance, or fear of collapse.
meaning.advice: Let the false fall so the real can stand.

major_16_tower.fact: The Tower is linked to Mars and abrupt change.
major_16_tower.detailedDescription: A sudden shake that reveals truth. Breakthrough, liberation, and clarity. Chaos, resistance, or fear of collapse. Let the false fall so the real can stand.

major_17_star.title: The Star

meaning.general: A quiet promise of renewal.
meaning.light: Hope, calm faith, and healing.
meaning.shadow: Doubt, discouragement, or losing faith.
meaning.advice: Keep the signal alive, even if it is small.

major_17_star.fact: The Star follows the Tower as a sign of recovery.
major_17_star.detailedDescription: A quiet promise of renewal. Hope, calm faith, and healing. Doubt, discouragement, or losing faith. Keep the signal alive, even if it is small.

major_18_moon.title: The Moon

meaning.general: The fog of intuition and the unseen.
meaning.light: Imagination, empathy, and subtle guidance.
meaning.shadow: Confusion, fear, or illusion.
meaning.advice: Move slowly and verify what you feel.

major_18_moon.fact: The Moon rules the tides of the unconscious.
major_18_moon.detailedDescription: The fog of intuition and the unseen. Imagination, empathy, and subtle guidance. Confusion, fear, or illusion. Move slowly and verify what you feel.

major_19_sun.title: The Sun

meaning.general: Warmth, visibility, and clear success.
meaning.light: Joy, vitality, and honest celebration.
meaning.shadow: Overexposure, ego, or burnout.
meaning.advice: Let your light be seen and shared.

major_19_sun.fact: The Sun is the clearest card of the deck.
major_19_sun.detailedDescription: Warmth, visibility, and clear success. Joy, vitality, and honest celebration. Overexposure, ego, or burnout. Let your light be seen and shared.

major_20_judgement.title: Judgement

meaning.general: A call to rise and be accountable.
meaning.light: Renewal, forgiveness, and clear purpose.
meaning.shadow: Harsh self-judgment or refusing the call.
meaning.advice: Answer honestly and step into the next chapter.

major_20_judgement.fact: Judgement is about awakening, not punishment.
major_20_judgement.detailedDescription: A call to rise and be accountable. Renewal, forgiveness, and clear purpose. Harsh self-judgment or refusing the call. Answer honestly and step into the next chapter.

major_21_world.title: The World

meaning.general: Completion and a sense of wholeness.
meaning.light: Integration, reward, and earned closure.
meaning.shadow: Delays in finishing or fearing the next cycle.
meaning.advice: Honor what is complete and open the next door.

major_21_world.fact: The World closes the Major Arcana journey.
major_21_world.detailedDescription: Completion and a sense of wholeness. Integration, reward, and earned closure. Delays in finishing or fearing the next cycle. Honor what is complete and open the next door.

wands_00_knight.title: Knight of Wands

meaning.general: The Knight of Wands points to decisive action and pursuit in the realm of passion, action, and courage.
meaning.light: At its best, it shows bold movement and initiative.
meaning.shadow: In shadow, it can show impulsiveness or recklessness.
meaning.advice: Advice: act with courage and direction.

wands_00_knight.fact: Knights bring motion to the suit in Wands.
wands_00_knight.detailedDescription: The Knight of Wands points to decisive action and pursuit in the realm of passion, action, and courage. At its best, it shows bold movement and initiative. In shadow, it can show impulsiveness or recklessness. Advice: act with courage and direction.

wands_01_king.title: King of Wands

meaning.general: The King of Wands points to outward mastery and leadership in the realm of passion, action, and courage.
meaning.light: At its best, it shows clear authority and wise direction.
meaning.shadow: In shadow, it can show rigidity or misuse of power.
meaning.advice: Advice: use your authority with integrity.

wands_01_king.fact: Kings express the suit's power outwardly in Wands.
wands_01_king.detailedDescription: The King of Wands points to outward mastery and leadership in the realm of passion, action, and courage. At its best, it shows clear authority and wise direction. In shadow, it can show rigidity or misuse of power. Advice: use your authority with integrity.

wands_02_queen.title: Queen of Wands

meaning.general: The Queen of Wands points to inner mastery and steady care in the realm of passion, action, and courage.
meaning.light: At its best, it shows warm leadership and emotional intelligence.
meaning.shadow: In shadow, it can show overcontrol or hidden resentment.
meaning.advice: Advice: lead quietly and consistently.

wands_02_queen.fact: Queens hold the suit's wisdom within in Wands.
wands_02_queen.detailedDescription: The Queen of Wands points to inner mastery and steady care in the realm of passion, action, and courage. At its best, it shows warm leadership and emotional intelligence. In shadow, it can show overcontrol or hidden resentment. Advice: lead quietly and consistently.

wands_03_page.title: Page of Wands

meaning.general: The Page of Wands points to curiosity and new information in the realm of passion, action, and courage.
meaning.light: At its best, it shows fresh study and openness.
meaning.shadow: In shadow, it can show naivety or scattered attention.
meaning.advice: Advice: stay curious and grounded.

wands_03_page.fact: Pages signal messages and beginnings in Wands.
wands_03_page.detailedDescription: The Page of Wands points to curiosity and new information in the realm of passion, action, and courage. At its best, it shows fresh study and openness. In shadow, it can show naivety or scattered attention. Advice: stay curious and grounded.

wands_04_two.title: Two of Wands

meaning.general: The Two of Wands points to a choice and a wider horizon in the realm of passion, action, and courage.
meaning.light: At its best, it shows steady planning and clear options.
meaning.shadow: In shadow, it can show indecision or waiting too long.
meaning.advice: Advice: choose a direction and commit.

wands_04_two.fact: Twos weigh options before the journey in Wands.
wands_04_two.detailedDescription: The Two of Wands points to a choice and a wider horizon in the realm of passion, action, and courage. At its best, it shows steady planning and clear options. In shadow, it can show indecision or waiting too long. Advice: choose a direction and commit.

wands_05_three.title: Three of Wands

meaning.general: The Three of Wands points to early results and expansion in the realm of passion, action, and courage.
meaning.light: At its best, it shows collaboration and momentum.
meaning.shadow: In shadow, it can show misalignment or slow feedback.
meaning.advice: Advice: share the load and keep moving.

wands_05_three.fact: Threes mark growth after the first step in Wands.
wands_05_three.detailedDescription: The Three of Wands points to early results and expansion in the realm of passion, action, and courage. At its best, it shows collaboration and momentum. In shadow, it can show misalignment or slow feedback. Advice: share the load and keep moving.

wands_06_four.title: Four of Wands

meaning.general: The Four of Wands points to stability and consolidation in the realm of passion, action, and courage.
meaning.light: At its best, it shows healthy rest and grounded structure.
meaning.shadow: In shadow, it can show stagnation or holding too tight.
meaning.advice: Advice: stabilize without freezing.

wands_06_four.fact: Fours create a base before the next push in Wands.
wands_06_four.detailedDescription: The Four of Wands points to stability and consolidation in the realm of passion, action, and courage. At its best, it shows healthy rest and grounded structure. In shadow, it can show stagnation or holding too tight. Advice: stabilize without freezing.

wands_07_five.title: Five of Wands

meaning.general: The Five of Wands points to friction and a test of will in the realm of passion, action, and courage.
meaning.light: At its best, it shows learning through challenge.
meaning.shadow: In shadow, it can show chaos, ego clashes, or loss.
meaning.advice: Advice: address the tension directly.

wands_07_five.fact: Fives introduce change through tension in Wands.
wands_07_five.detailedDescription: The Five of Wands points to friction and a test of will in the realm of passion, action, and courage. At its best, it shows learning through challenge. In shadow, it can show chaos, ego clashes, or loss. Advice: address the tension directly.

wands_08_six.title: Six of Wands

meaning.general: The Six of Wands points to progress and shared support in the realm of passion, action, and courage.
meaning.light: At its best, it shows recognition and smooth cooperation.
meaning.shadow: In shadow, it can show complacency or shallow wins.
meaning.advice: Advice: accept help and keep pace.

wands_08_six.fact: Sixes bring cooperation and relief in Wands.
wands_08_six.detailedDescription: The Six of Wands points to progress and shared support in the realm of passion, action, and courage. At its best, it shows recognition and smooth cooperation. In shadow, it can show complacency or shallow wins. Advice: accept help and keep pace.

wands_09_seven.title: Seven of Wands

meaning.general: The Seven of Wands points to strategy and measured resistance in the realm of passion, action, and courage.
meaning.light: At its best, it shows focus, persistence, and smart boundaries.
meaning.shadow: In shadow, it can show overdefending or second-guessing.
meaning.advice: Advice: protect your ground without closing off.

wands_09_seven.fact: Sevens test focus and resolve in Wands.
wands_09_seven.detailedDescription: The Seven of Wands points to strategy and measured resistance in the realm of passion, action, and courage. At its best, it shows focus, persistence, and smart boundaries. In shadow, it can show overdefending or second-guessing. Advice: protect your ground without closing off.

wands_10_eight.title: Eight of Wands

meaning.general: The Eight of Wands points to speed and skill-building in the realm of passion, action, and courage.
meaning.light: At its best, it shows productive flow and steady motion.
meaning.shadow: In shadow, it can show rushed choices or burnout.
meaning.advice: Advice: move quickly, but keep form.

wands_10_eight.fact: Eights accelerate the suit's energy in Wands.
wands_10_eight.detailedDescription: The Eight of Wands points to speed and skill-building in the realm of passion, action, and courage. At its best, it shows productive flow and steady motion. In shadow, it can show rushed choices or burnout. Advice: move quickly, but keep form.

wands_11_nine.title: Nine of Wands

meaning.general: The Nine of Wands points to endurance and nearing completion in the realm of passion, action, and courage.
meaning.light: At its best, it shows strong boundaries and grit.
meaning.shadow: In shadow, it can show fatigue or isolation.
meaning.advice: Advice: protect your energy and finish well.

wands_11_nine.fact: Nines hold steady near the finish in Wands.
wands_11_nine.detailedDescription: The Nine of Wands points to endurance and nearing completion in the realm of passion, action, and courage. At its best, it shows strong boundaries and grit. In shadow, it can show fatigue or isolation. Advice: protect your energy and finish well.

wands_12_ten.title: Ten of Wands

meaning.general: The Ten of Wands points to a cycle reaching full weight in the realm of passion, action, and courage.
meaning.light: At its best, it shows completion and a clear finish line.
meaning.shadow: In shadow, it can show overload or carrying too much.
meaning.advice: Advice: share the burden and wrap it up.

wands_12_ten.fact: Tens close the suit's cycle in Wands.
wands_12_ten.detailedDescription: The Ten of Wands points to a cycle reaching full weight in the realm of passion, action, and courage. At its best, it shows completion and a clear finish line. In shadow, it can show overload or carrying too much. Advice: share the burden and wrap it up.

wands_13_ace.title: Ace of Wands

meaning.general: The Ace of Wands points to a new seed and raw potential in the realm of passion, action, and courage.
meaning.light: At its best, it shows fresh energy and a clean opening.
meaning.shadow: In shadow, it can show potential without follow-through.
meaning.advice: Advice: plant the seed and nurture it.

wands_13_ace.fact: Aces are the first pulse of the suit in Wands.
wands_13_ace.detailedDescription: The Ace of Wands points to a new seed and raw potential in the realm of passion, action, and courage. At its best, it shows fresh energy and a clean opening. In shadow, it can show potential without follow-through. Advice: plant the seed and nurture it.
